name: Pong - Scratch
description:
A pong game I made around an year ago using Scratch. To play this game, select one of the gamemodes. There are also a few extra features, such as the '9' key, which allows you to modify a variable, and the '8' key, which spawns in a second pong ball inside of 2 player mode.

Game Link: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/529471326/
